vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.19;
son of: Ebiasaph (H0043);
brother of: Assir (H0617H); also called Korahite at 1Ch.26.19; 1x
§ Kore = "crier"
1) a Korahite Levite, ancestor of Shallum and Meshelemiah, chief porters in the reign of David
2) a Levite, son of Imnah, in the reign of king Hezekiah of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Ebiasaf; padre de Salum, portero; (b)   hijo de Asaf; portero; en tiempos del rey David; (c)   hijo de Imná; portero; en tiempos del rey Ezequías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
可利 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "哭泣者"
1) 一位可拉的利未人, 是大衛時的會幕守衛,沙龍和米施利米雅的祖先 (代上 9:19;26:1)
2) 利未人音拿的一個兒子, 猶大王希西家時的人 (代下 31:14)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
可利 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "哭泣者"
1) 一位可拉的利未人, 是大卫时的会幕守卫,沙龙和米施利米雅的祖先 (代上 9:19;26:1)
2) 利未人音拿的一个儿子, 犹大王希西家时的人 (代下 31:14)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.31.14;
son of: Imnah (H3232H)
§ Kore = "crier"
1) a Korahite Levite, ancestor of Shallum and Meshelemiah, chief porters in the reign of David
2) a Levite, son of Imnah, in the reign of king Hezekiah of Judah
